reminder_message: Schedule your free appointment with us!
side_detective_1: Do you have any problems in the economic, criminal, civil, divorce matters?
side_detective_2: Do you suspect that your life partner is unfaithful to you?
side_debt_collection_1: Does the debtor not settle the payments on time?
side_business_intelligence_1: Would you like to know more details about third parties which you work with or a competitor?
side_business_protection_1: When your company secrets are being disclosed or do you suspect of being surveilled?
side_business_protection_2: Perhaps, do you have a feeling of being observed or someone tried to receive unauthorized access to your documents or talks?
side_business_protection_3: Do you have concerns relating with the integrity aspects within your Company?
side_workshops_1: You want to be aware of threats in a hostile business environment?
contact_form_caption: In Jaran we always have time for our customers. Leave us a message including your name and e-mail address. Describe your case and how you would expect us to help you. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_caption: Our office is located in the center of Warsaw, less than 400 meters from the Palace of Culture and Science. We invite you to Pozna≈Ñska Street in Warsaw, however, we can meet in another convenient place.
